name: Psycho Project Alpha
description:
"PSYCHO PROJECT"

STORY: Strange events started in the small local forest and your goal is to unravel the truth and escape.

GAME: The player must collect the items in different parts of the map while a demon is chasing her, do not forget your Psycho icon if it reaches very low levels the evil will take over you, your goal is to kill the forest demon.

FEATURES:

  1. Run and Hide - combat unavailable
  2. Sanity called Psycho
  3. Stamina bar
  4. Usable Items

CONTROLLER: Open the Menu in game with ESC or M to see all the keys.

WARNING: Loud noises

FUTURE: This is just a small taste of the future of Psycho Project. Heavy Dev Studios is working on the development of multiplayer, YES THE PROJECT WILL BE MULTIPLAYER, nothing like sharing some shouts with friends. More maps, darker atmosphere, better gameplay and new escape methods in the full version, maybe a campaign in chapters in the future for single player lovers, see you in Q4 2022 and beware of the dark...
